posts.title: Sailboat Napkin Holder
posts.content: Lift up your anchor and set sail for cleanliness with these adorably clever sailboat napkin holders. Available in either black or red colors, the sailboat napkin holders are a cute way to display your napkins on a kid’s table, a dinner table, or just a kitchen counter-top.

posts.title: Pros And Cons Notepad
posts.content: Solve any dilemma that comes your way with ruthless efficiency with hep from this pros and cons notepad. Whenever you’re struggling with one of life’s many conundrums, simply list the good and the bad on each side so you can rationally reach a decision.

posts.title: LEGO Death Star
posts.content: Construct the Imperial Army’s greatest weapon ever when you take on the challenge of building the LEGO Death Star. The iconic moon-like planet destroying space station is now in LEGO form, just waiting for some <del>rebel scum to blow it up</del> person to step on it.

posts.title: Solar Powered Wireless Keyboard
posts.content: Enjoy the benefits of a wireless keyboard without the hassle of needing batteries by upgrading to the solar powered wireless keyboard. Once this ultra-slim keyboard is charged by any type of UV light, it can last for up to three months in total darkness.

posts.title: Tattoo Oven Mitt
posts.content: The tattoo oven mitt will make you look as tough as an old time sailor, even while baking muffins. This protective mitt keeps your hands safe when cooking with hot pots and pans, and gives you the tattooed sleeves and muscley forearms you’ve always dreamed of having.

posts.title: Potato Clock Science Kit
posts.content: Teach your little science enthusiast about the transformative power of green energy using this potato clock science kit. The kit includes a digital clock, wires, and prongs – all you need to do is hook the prongs up to two spuds in order to power the small digital clock.

posts.title: LED Foosball Table
posts.content: Kick up your next foosball tournament’s glam factor by playing on this eye-catching LED foosball table. The table comes lined with a thin LED strip around the entire playing field that gives the foosball men and playing field a custom glow.

posts.title: Battleship USB Hub
posts.content: Everyone needs a convenient USB hub, so he or she can keep track of the phone plug, the camera plug, and the mouse plug — with this battleship USB hub, you can keep track of all of the above while making boat and bomb noises under your breath.

posts.title: Innie Shoelace Fastener
posts.content: Transform any shoe into a comfortable slip-on using this innie shoelace fastener. These easy to install fasteners can be adjusted to any length, are compatible with any lace type – eliminating the need for having to constantly tie and untie your laces.

posts.title: Swiss Cheese Door Stopper
posts.content: Even those who are lactose intolerant will be able to enjoy a thick slice of Swiss cheese – as long as they use it to prop open the door. The Swiss cheese door stopper resembles a wedge of tasty cheese that is ideal for holding any door open without leaving scratch marks.

posts.title: Camp Stove Toaster
posts.content: Enjoy a golden crispy slice of toast while roughing it in the wild with the camp stove toaster. With a design that’s as efficient as it is lightweight and portable, it let’s you cook up to four pieces of toast at a time so everyone at the campsite can enjoy a tasty breakfast.

posts.title: Handlebar iPhone Holder
posts.content: Outfit your bicycle with a handy GPS system by installing the handlebar iPhone holder. The holder firmly attaches your iPhone to the handlebar to provide a convenient way of accessing your phone’s GPS or other useful apps while you are riding your bicycle.
